original_text:
For every boot of the tramping warrior in battle tumult
    and every garment rolled in blood
    will be burned as fuel for the fire.
korean_text: 어지러이 싸우는 군인들의 신과 피 묻은 겉옷이 불에 섶 같이 살라지리니

sentences.original_text: For every boot of the tramping warrior in battle tumult
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁의 소동 속에서 짓밟는 전사의 모든 신발은

sentences.original_text: and every garment rolled in blood
will be burned as fuel for the fire.
